channel.title: American Animals
channel.desc: Four friends hatch a plan to carry out an audacious heist, stealing books that are worth millions from a college library.

channel.title: Universal Soldier: Day of Reckoning
channel.desc: After waking up from a coma, John vows to kill the man responsible for the death of his wife and daughter. However, his vengeance leads him to encounter a terrifying army of reanimated supersoldiers.
